description: Arbitrage Crypto Trader - the world's first platform for automatic trading on two exchanges at the same time. We unite all the largest trading exchanges in the world and offer you to earn money on them. Our main goal is to make available for you a convenient tool for earning one of the oldest ways of trading - Arbitrage. You buy on one exchange, and sell for another. We do not take your funds under our control and we do not need access to your purses. Your currency is stored on your stock exchange accounts. We are already at the stage of closed beta testing and are ready to share with you our reports on the work done.
name: ArbitrageCT
